lender.name: Preston & Heather
lender.loan_because: We both support our local community and have been searching for a way to contribute outside our community where we can see the impact of our contributions. Kiva gives us that opportunity to see where our money goes, and the ability to re-contribute the funds when they are paid back.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: I love people ... and I love the creative and entrepreneurial spirit!
lender.occupational_info: Fun and Rewarding, I design software applications

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in developing countries build better lives for themselves, their families, and their communities - and, from 2009, without promoting animal exploitation.

lender.name: Al
lender.loan_because: Kiva loans are not charity. "Give someone a fish." vs. "Teach someone to fish." The Kiva system is a win-win proposition, for both the lender and the lendee.
lender.occupational_info: I design and build custom applications for businesses that have special needs which can not be met by commercially available software. I do pro bono work for various non-profit organizations in my local area. As a Microsoft Access MVP, I volunteer my time on the Access newsgroups to answer questions from users from all over the world.

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: I want to put my money where my idealistic heart is. Kiva just helps my little corner of the world reach out to other corners in need.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies get thoughts and content into profitable websites.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: It's better to help people learn how to fish...

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: "The true meaning of life is to plant trees, under whose shade you do not expect to sit." By : Nelson Henderson

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: The bible says thou shalt be the lender and not the borrower. I believe in turning borrowers into lenders.
lender.occupational_info: I operate a family owned Online retail store we call "The Peoples Seller" Deuteronmy 8:18

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I can. It's such a great way to make a little difference in this world. Isn't it cool what we can all do together.
lender.occupational_info: I help my company make sure they have enough employees to take care of business.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: Because a better question is why I don't lend. Plus, it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a software company that makes software for banks in the US.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because:
My family and I think Kiva is a brilliant idea. Being in business myself, I understand how hard it is to grow a business even under good economic conditions. The challenges that the entrepreneurs on Kiva face are far, far, far greater and I applaud and greatly admire them all for their commitment, ambition and tenacity! I'll be doing my best to get other businesses involved.
We only wish we could lend to all of the entrepreneurs listed on Kiva!
Involvement in Kiva is also a great project for families; helping to raise and maintain our awareness of just how tough things can be for others and that we all have a responsibility to help where we can. Each of my family is choosing an entrepreneur to lend to.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a renewable energy company in Australia that sells solar panels etc. and also provide marketing and ecommerce consultancy services; i.e. helping small businesses succeed on the Internet.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because:
I think that microcredit is a beautiful and powerful concept for helping the developing world, and it makes me very happy to make a demonstrable difference in the life of somebody who really needs it.
Also, microloans are very complicated, logistically speaking, and purely altruistic... If such a thing can succeed through kindness and creativity, it will confirm my best suspicions about the human race.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student studying computer science. I hope to one day design video games.

lender.name: kirian
lender.loan_because: I want to try theother side of life because I believe success in lifedependson how you succeed tostrike an equilibrium between accademics ans business.I have been doing business and schooling at the same time. And now that I have reach the point that I wanted,I want to concerntrate on business.
lender.occupational_info: Being a student and blending with business is something I very much admired because the knowlegede acquired helps you in your busness which of course makes it easy forme to handle it well.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I grew up in a single parent household whose income was always hovering around the poverty line. But because we lived in North America, my siblings and I have had opportunities children of poor families in other countries have not. I want to do whatever I can to help parents in other parts of the world with lower incomes provide for their children and ultimately give them some of the opportunities they deserve.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Law Clerk and I assist Lawyers at my firm with their preparation for high profile law suits.

lender.name: Planet Botanicals
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to help local entrepeneurs and make a direct impact in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Manufacturer of natural and fair trade certified skincare using ingredients from around the world; committed to the principles of fair trade and sustainability.

lender.name: GreenTara
lender.loan_because: We feel very blessed in our lives.
lender.occupational_info: May the merits from our positive activities in all our lives be dedicated to all beings, for now and eons to come.

lender.name: Marcus
lender.loan_because: Working in banking I love the idea of Kiva. It is fantastic to help enterprenuers in the most efective way!
lender.occupational_info: Risk Manager of a large German bank.

lender.name: Roy & Amy
lender.occupation: Amy is a nurse and Roy plays with computers...
lender.loan_because: "Blessed is he who remembers the poor. God will remember him in his time of trouble." (Psalm 41:1)

lender.name: Katie
lender.occupational_info: I go to school and take care of other peoples children!

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: As the liberal daughter of a fiscally conservative economist I'm thrilled to be able to use the free market to ease poverty.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world and spread God's love.

lender.name: papaChet and Avery
lender.loan_because: Helping others to help themselves is preached by my father-in-law, Preston C. Oliver.
lender.occupational_info: I am a choir director and I teach music.

lender.name: Maven 2.0
lender.loan_because: we enjoy helping our brothers and sisters around the world to support their families and succeed with their business ventures.
lender.occupational_info: Maven 2.0 provides website development and business model consulting for lean start-ups.

lender.name: Dean
lender.loan_because: It is only right to share from my abundance with those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I see patients in a medical clinic.

lender.name: Kay Girls
lender.loan_because: We wish to empower women all over the world.

lender.name: Gaëlle
lender.loan_because: Because the ones who fight to get some resources got to be help if they need.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an advertisement company on internet.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I know that microcredit is one of the most effective ways to help people out of poverty, and I want to be a part of that solution.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying for an advanced degree in physics, and I teach physics labs to college students.

lender.name: paul
lender.loan_because: I want to make a direct impact on people who I have met in my travels.

lender.name: Mitchell
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference to our world. & who wouldn't want to put in an effort, that will in the end create a great impact on another persons life. & with that impact it could potentially create a better global community.

lender.name: Kathy & Jeff
lender.occupational_info: We own a small business, Hawkins Multimedia, that specializes in writing and web design.

lender.name: Donald & Carrie
lender.loan_because: The reason is sitting in my lap in the photograph. I want her to inherit a better world.

lender.name: Sandrine
lender.loan_because: it's smart

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference to the lives of people who are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who are in physical pain

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I enjoy seeing others strive for success as I have.
lender.occupational_info: I am enjoying my retirement. I have many projects that keep me busy, including rebuilding my home that was flooded in 05. My favorite passtime is fishing.

lender.name: Monte
lender.occupation: retired pastor who drives school buses part-time
lender.loan_because: I like to.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: There are far to many with dreams but lack the financial means to achieve those dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am a military police officer in the US Navy.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: few of us are in a position to make changes that affect millions, but I can choose to build a life made of smaller, cumulative actions that positively influence others.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain my library's website. At the end of the day, I go home knowing that what I do brings people in contact with knowledge. You can't put a price on that.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I've been fortunate in my life, and want to help give others a chance to improve their lives, and their children's.
lender.occupational_info: I teach classes in microbiology and biotechnology at a university, and hope that my students will help to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: these folks deserve it. And the world needs them.

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: the people who participate in this program are worth investing in!
lender.occupational_info: I manage the day to day, non-sales related operations of a small, niche furniture manufacturer/retailer.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to live a life where I have the opportunity for education, health care and strong support systems. These allow me to be and do anything I want and I think everyone should have the same opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I work on an ambulance giving emergency medical treatment and taking sick and injured people to hospital.

lender.name: Susanne
lender.loan_because: with what i earn i can happily live and don´t have to be afraid to go to bed hungry. if somebody else can say the same for themselves because of a little help from me life looks much nicer to me too
lender.occupational_info: i meet people from many different backgrounds and exchange ideas and views

lender.name: Felipe
lender.loan_because: There are a lot of good and hard working people out there. They just need an opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I am a software developer.

lender.name: Chingyi
lender.loan_because: I could make a difference by loaning. Even $25 can help a lot.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to attend trade shows and sell fancy stationery and gifts to international buyers.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I believe aid is more effective at grass-roots level than given to large organisations who have to pay administrative costs.
lender.occupational_info: Documenting cross-cultural concerns expats should consider when working overseas.

lender.name: alan
lender.loan_because:
This is a great way for a gift to "keep on giving" by being re-invested with many recipients over time.
I like that I can learn a little about the people using the money I lend, and I like that I can pick and choose the recipients.
lender.occupational_info: I run a digital agency and invest in tech startups

lender.name: Rickard
lender.loan_because: Loans to entrepreneurs is a better way to help, instead of just giving. It gives people the opportunity to earn their own money and helps to develop the economy. As the proverb says: “Give someone a fish and you feed him for a day; Teach someone to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.”

lender.name: Rosalyn
lender.loan_because: I support the efforts of individuals who want to make their lives better. It makes me feel good to know that I have helped a few individuals, even in a small way.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: it a simple way to add more beauty and goodness to the world.
lender.occupational_info: My goal, mission, and life passion is to facilitate the most efficient and effective healing and transformation so you can live now with the level of holistic health you were designed for.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I can. And that's not me, but our dog Pearl. She has a good heart, so she's trying to help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a professor.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to work their way out of poverty in a dignified way. Micro finance provides that opportunity.

lender.name: B.P. Lending Division
lender.loan_because: Every dollar that one spends on excessive luxuries could have gone to shelter, defend, clothe, or feed another Human.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a local government hospital to improve the quality and efficiency of healthcare.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together....... I AM my brothers keeper....

lender.name: Yannick
lender.loan_because: this is a good way to help people to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: Making Research for an Environmental Company

lender.name: ALFEN
lender.loan_because: I really want to help people to change their own lifes. This is one very good way. Let money from the rich part of the world work in poor regions.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I live by 3 main tenets: 1. Have fun! 2. Make Money! 3. Do good and help others.
lender.occupational_info: I build and develop biotech companies.

lender.name: Steve,Vicky,Erin,Sarah
lender.loan_because: I like to invest in people instead of assets. Also I think it is important to "think globally, act locally"
lender.occupational_info: Our family includes 2 engineers and 2 students.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: It is a way of acting out my faith.

lender.name: marlene
lender.loan_because: A helping hand up for every one.
lender.occupational_info: I was a sales rep most of my life and am now retired. I care for my two grandchildren two days each week and travel at every opportunity

lender.name: Jay + Alice + Kurt +Maya
lender.loan_because: It is a way for us to use our success to enable others to create their own successes.
lender.occupational_info: Jay is an entrepreneur and has seen the impact that can have on the hundreds of families the business touches. Alice is a strategy consultant for Bridgespan a consultancy focused on building successful non-profit organizations.

lender.name: Bailey
lender.loan_because: Love Wins
lender.occupational_info: Play at school...Hang out with my family...Go to church.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I want to help people get the tools they need to be self-sufficient and proud.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with all the legal work necessary to start a new business.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I want to help those that are less fortunate than I.

lender.name: Austin
lender.loan_because: I think that loans are a much more effective way of helping someone than just giving away money. You're much more responsible with it if you have an obligation to pay someone back.
lender.occupational_info: I buy companies, grow them, and then, hopefully, sell them for a profit.

lender.name: Jack Ray,
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from the American Navy and widowed. My wife died from ALS

lender.name: Jorge Rodrigues
lender.loan_because: I want.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and I want to share His blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer engineer and I assist companies in designing their systems to recover from catastrophic disasters.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, and the feeling that you get after you loan is amazing!
lender.occupational_info: I am only a junior, so I volunteer and donate when opportunities present themselves. Luckily, I can volunteer at a soup kitchen every weekend :)

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: it's a brilliant opportunity to make a huge impact with the relatively small amount I have to give.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I move money around. From people with it and willing to invest, to people who need the money.

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: Many of us in the US have been blessed with so much. If the small amount I loan here can help someone somewhere; I want to be a part of that.
lender.occupational_info: I am the head administrator in a small, rural school in Montana.

lender.name: Sapna
lender.loan_because: technology can empower me to help alleviate poverty and more importantly, initiate progression in someone's life. I like that...and of course, helping people in whatever capacity I can.

lender.name: Sophie & Harley
lender.loan_because: My mom and dad teach my sister Harley and I that we should always help others and give of ourselves. They say it is a blessing and is to be done with joy and gratitude. Harley wouldn't sit still for her picture to be taken so I get to be spokesdog.
lender.occupational_info: We jump up and down, wag our tails, smile really big and give our family kisses when they walk through the door. After that we spend all of our time keeping them company, especially at night while they sleep.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the non-profit arm of a large credit union.

lender.name: Jake
lender.loan_because: I believe in the free market and in people.

lender.name: Ahkilah Johnson
lender.occupation: Shoe Shopper and MIlk Shake Connoisseur
lender.loan_because: God's work is done through the hands of his children. God asked me to help out.

lender.name: Oscar
lender.loan_because: There are others who can use my financial support in a great way.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of giving a business loan and not a handout.
lender.occupational_info: Pilot

lender.name: Rich K
lender.loan_because: I like to see people get a break and become successful in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Consult on food safety and regulatory matters for food companies.

lender.name: Darrel
lender.loan_because: I am an atheist, secular humanist and author of The God Virus: How Religion Infects Our Lives and Culture (IPC Press, 2009). I have been a member of Kiva for over two years and have found this to be a superb way to help people in a way that ensures the money is used wisely. I keep about $450 in circulation at any given time. That may sound like a lot, but it really isn't since I have loaned every dollar of that money many times. I decided that instead of just giving money to some charity and never seeing any results, I would put some of the money I normally give into Kiva. I have only had two $25 loans default in over two years and 60 or 70 loans (maybe more). Thanks to the Kiva staff for this great organization. I tell people about it at every opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Author, organizational psychologist.

lender.name: pura vida
lender.loan_because: a little voice told us to.
lender.occupational_info: We live in Minneapolis where we work in Construction and sales. We are involved in Nicaragua and have lived in Thailand. We firmly believe luck and chance have given us the opportunity to learn from other people and hopefully to help in some small way.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: This is a great idea!
lender.occupational_info: I defend people in court when the government accuses them of crimes.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I hope to help people achieve their greatest potential.
lender.occupational_info: As a Certified Public Accountant (CPA) I used to help people prepare their accounting records and reports, and I helped them to prepare their government tax reports. I am now retired.

lender.name: Herve
lender.loan_because: I want people to share happiness, live in peace, and be free from any form of oppression.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I am.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a very creative place with lots of artists.

lender.name: TRACY
lender.loan_because: having been born in Kenya it gives me great pleasure to help empower woman to become economically independent in a country where i grew up
lender.occupational_info: I am a self employed hairdresser and nutritionist. It gives me great pleasure when i get results from both my hairsyling and nutritional data. I love what i do.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: this is such an awesome opportunity to help people live their dreams of financial independence.
lender.occupational_info: I help people work safely, with respect for each other and their environment.

lender.name: george
lender.loan_because: I like to show the positive side of America.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an Officer in the U.S. Navy

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because:
I find it a very interesting way of funding people to help themselves.
I think Microlending has potential.
lender.occupational_info: Work in a corporate organisation as a information technology manager

lender.name: World of Neighbors
lender.loan_because: 1 John 3:17-18: How does God's love abide in anyone who has the world's goods and sees a brother or sister in need and yet refuses help? Little children, let us love, not in word or speech, but in truth and action.
lender.occupational_info: Envisioning a world without poverty and injustice, our small group works faithfully to bring this world into being by educating and empowering ourselves and others. We live by the Great Commandment to love our neighbors as ourselves.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: It is great to help someone help themselves.

lender.name: Janne
lender.loan_because: I believe conscious capitalism combines the best of free markets and philanthropy.

lender.name: Madolyn
lender.loan_because: it's fun to be part of this collective process.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I'd like to support small business entrepreneurs in the less wealthy parts of the world. I hope they'll get the opportunity to develop themselves and help their communities to have economic growth.
lender.occupational_info: Our agency designs websites and develops internet applications.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I want to know that I have helped someone else to move ahead!

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I care (and have spent time in the developing world and appreciate that micro-credit really makes a difference.)
lender.occupational_info: I build professional websites and help market them so that they get found by the "right" people via the Internet. I also speak and do workshops on Internet marketing and "Winning with Ease: Life Lessons Learned from Golf"

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Traveling and doing business around-the-world has made me realize that very little (to me)can make a big difference to others.
lender.occupational_info: Former, now retired, international businessman. Primary area was consumer electronics.

lender.name: s & t
lender.loan_because: people have done the same for me!

lender.name: Sami Swan
lender.loan_because: my ethics compel me to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a freelance writer and editor, collage artist, and independent advocate for the elderly. My latest project is PROMPTLY WRITTEN; check it out at the url listed in the website space below:

lender.name: shelli
lender.occupational_info: I work in wastewater reclamation and reuse. We use a process called activates sludge (microbiology) to help clean up the wastewater. Once the wastewater has completed the process it is then used at golf courses and ponds. This is the reuse part of the process.

lender.name: Mark & Silvia
lender.loan_because: I first got interested in the Grammeen Bank about 15 years ago and I usually give to various charities. This is much better as you are making a direct contribution to someones life!!
lender.occupational_info: Silvia and I are raising our first child, Lia who is 1 month old. We do have regular jobs in computers and real estate. We are both from Canada but work in the US which has been very good to us.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I have claimed to be "too busy" to get involved in charity long enough! Kiva is an excellent place to start.
lender.occupational_info: I engineer new materials that are used to advance communication technology, medicine, semiconductors etc.

lender.name: Coleen
lender.loan_because: I like to help women who are trying to create a successful business to support their families and improve their life experiences.
lender.occupational_info: I help people solve their software issues. I also have my own business creating handmade soap, bath & body products.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: Self sufficiency is the way to a successful life.
lender.occupational_info: I operate two shelters for homeless families in California.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: We all have a responsibility to help each other in any way we can.

lender.name: Gordon and Cathy
lender.loan_because: We all should share what we have. We are neighbors.
lender.occupational_info: We primarily work with government and non-profit health care organizations to provide administrative assistance and data organization.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: Together we can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I edit a magazine about drums and drummers.

lender.name: Sang Hoon
lender.loan_because: The fact that I can help someone in need makes me feel fulfilled.
lender.occupational_info: I lecture mathematics in college.

lender.name: Justin and Kim
lender.occupation: Sales Manager and Stay at Home Mom
lender.loan_because: We have a responsibility to help others if we have the means. It's all God's money anyway.
lender.occupational_info: Social Enterprise and Micro-Lending give normal people the ability to help change the world.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: It's wonderful that Kiva provides a way for me to offer a hand to help people that are working to improve their lives and the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a marketing account manager for an insurance company. Basically, I keep our customers happy by coordinating all of their communications with our different internal departments.

lender.name: Angela and her family!
lender.loan_because: I've seen micro-credit touch lives! I first learned about the Grammeen Bank 5 years ago when I worked with an organization called, Reach The Children. I worked with an AIDS Prevention program and saw how micro-finance along with other programs can help make a large difference.
lender.occupational_info: I started a similar company called, "Given Tree". We certify NGO's and make sure they're up to standard before posting projects for people to give to. We do not do micro-loans. We do other essential projects that are so badly needed; well building, schools, AIDS/HIV Prevention, etc.

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: I hope to support women in developing countries find a route to independence, and the ability to educate themselves and their children.
lender.occupational_info: I am a therapist trained to help children and adults who have oral communication problems.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Ambas Geda
lender.occupation: Group of friends in MI/OH USA

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: I owned my own business at one point and I know how difficult it can be.
lender.occupational_info: My passions are travel & writing. Check out my travel blog at http://conniemotz.blogspot.com

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs around the world in building their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: At work, I create database applications that help clinicians help people with mental health, intellectual disability and substance abuse issues. After work, I mainly watch soccer, cook, and try to learn Spanish.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I may not be the most industrious person in the world, but I love supporting others who are fighting to improve their lot. Watching others succeed gives me a little more fire in my approach to life. In that sense, my loans help me while helping the entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: because I like to use the resources (time, talents and money) that have been given to me to help change peoples lives. Through Kiva I can do this.
lender.occupational_info: I am a social entrepreneur in the health and technology fields. I also am an avid fitness buff that currently likes to ride, run and swim.

lender.name: BondsFamily
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: he: advertising she: consultant kids: 12 & 9

lender.name: beucher
lender.loan_because: parce que les belles paroles ne suffisent pas, je souhaite participer à cette grande aventure qu'est le microcrédit et le soutien de projets locaux.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I oversee a department responsible for administration of poverty programs.

lender.name: Tory
lender.loan_because: the gap between the rich and poor needs to be closed
lender.occupational_info: I work in a program that helps keep families together and opens up communication between teens and their parents

lender.name: Leticia
lender.loan_because: We musn´t give up on poverty and we can help people to have a good life in their own countries .This is an exelent way to do it .High five to all of us who helped to raise the needed money to help this particular person .

lender.name: Jo Ann
lender.loan_because: My 8th grade social studies students helped pick the people I am loaning to. It helped us all learn about geography, economics, and the hearts of people.

lender.name: Efren
lender.loan_because: Everyone with sound business ideas should be able to get "off the ground." The lack of start-up costs should not be the deciding factor on whether a person's business dream is achieved. Cualquier persona que tenga buenas ideas empresarias deberia de poder realizar sus metas. El no tener finanzas seminales no es razon para no poder lograr sus suenos de ser empresario.
lender.occupational_info: Social Work Supervisor

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I think it's cool to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Elika
lender.loan_because: I think the world gets better through little steps

lender.name: Jo
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to help people help themselves

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I love helping people this way because I know where my dollars go.

lender.name: Meredith
lender.loan_because: Micro credit is empowering! Unlike traditional development programs focusing on industrialization, micro lending allows recipients to define their own needs and to live their lives in the way that they have reason to value.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Ph.D. candidate in sociology studying development programs for women in South India.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: We visit countries frequently that have many hard working people that could use loans just like these. We're glad to have found a place where we can directly help others and view their progress.
lender.occupational_info: I book people on cruise ship vacations. My wife provides health care to the elderly, and my daughters are school students. They go door to door to secure donations for Kiva.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I wish to help others like all Americans. Please do not let global or governmental politics dictate otherwise. Americans do CARE!
lender.occupational_info: Technology consulting for small to medium size business

lender.name: Klaus & Brita
lender.loan_because: It is the little people with the desire to better themselves who will, by their example, really change the world for the better.
lender.occupational_info: holistic farming

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: it's good karma.
lender.occupational_info: I deliver medicine to sick people.

lender.name: Dave & Desiree
lender.loan_because: We see the potential if only given the chance as we were.....these loans can change generations of lives.

lender.name: Prescott
lender.loan_because: Every human has a right to survival

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: There have been times in my life when people gave me a hand when I really needed it. This is my way of continuing that trend... helping when I can in a way that has minimal overhead and the potential for a big impact.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a systems (computer) manager for a large book-publishing company.

lender.name: Rod
lender.loan_because: God's blessings are to be shared.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone can make a difference. Positive change takes people willing to be selfless one step at a time.
lender.occupational_info: My company helps credit unions and banks find new locations for their branches by looking at the demographics and financial habits of targeted populations.

lender.name: Janna
lender.loan_because: I like it.

lender.name: Walt Kuenstler
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great way to help hard working people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer and marketing consultant.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I believe that the active and unsolicited redistribution of wealth from the those in the developed world to those in need in the developing world is one the greatest tools currently available to combat the day-to-day realities of poverty and inequality.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: Generosity is the virtue that produces peace. Generosity is the transcended friend!
lender.occupational_info: I lend money to (comparitively) rich Americans so they can buy houses.

lender.name: Harry
lender.loan_because: the effectiveness of micro-loans has been demonstrated. Few other programs seem to have as much promise for true grass-roots economic development and alleviation of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am an engineer working with a global software company. I am living in Nicaragua now.

lender.name: Edwin
lender.loan_because: Joy is increased by sharing.
lender.occupational_info: Caring, relating, striving to heal.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a direct, practical way to help people help themselves. I invest in Ukraine because I have visited Ukraine on several business trips and I like the Ukrainian people.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small, entrepreneurial aerospace company.

lender.name: Simon
lender.occupational_info: I work with newspapers to get information to disaster victims.

lender.name: Dr. Rey
lender.loan_because: it is our obligation as human beings to help one another.
lender.occupational_info: I am an administrator at a college.

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: I want to engage with others across the world.

lender.name: Luiz
lender.loan_because: micro-lending has the power to change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I wouldn't describe my work, I'd tell them I love U.S. soccer, D.C. United and FC Barcelona.

lender.name: Auren
lender.loan_because: I love people.
lender.occupational_info: Forward Fashion (dot org) is a site dedicated to the promotion of eco-fashion, with an additional emphasis on socially conscious living and the ways in which social entrepreneurship can add to the green movement and society at large.

lender.name: Adrienne
lender.loan_because: I like the idea that I can help someone in another part of the world create a livelihood for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that sells affordable clothing and home goods, and I help them plan for new stores.

lender.name: Samson
lender.loan_because: I want to build connections with people who are bettering themselves.

lender.name: Fabio
lender.loan_because: I believe this is one of the most effective ways to help the poor help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I develop mathematical models for trading.

lender.name: Phil & Jean
lender.loan_because: kiva provides a way to learn about people in distant countries while making a small but meaningful difference in their lives.

lender.name: T K S N M Sherry
lender.loan_because: We are so fortunate!
lender.occupational_info: Health Care

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: It's a mitzvah. If we learn about a hard-working person who needs a little help to become independent and rise out of poverty, shouldn't we reach out to that person? This is a great way to do it, to make a difference, one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I consult radio stations and train future broadcasters and journalists. I also teach media history, ethics, and comparative religions. And, I write articles for a number of magazines and newspapers. In my spare time, I volunteer as a tutor.

lender.name: Mehdi
lender.loan_because: The purpose of living is to make a living that worth living. I hope we could make many lives worth living by these small loans. MicroCredit is scientifically proved to be one of the few constructive and efficient ways to end/alleviate poverty around the world with almost no rival. It is easy, direct and with negligible waste of resources. Interestingly, On long run it helps both rich and poor.

lender.name: Cary
lender.loan_because:
Because Jesus said the following about himself:
The spirit of the sovereign Lord is upon me, because the Lord has chosen me. He has commissioned me to encourage the poor, to help the brokenhearted, to decree the release of captives, and the freeing of prisoners Isaiah 61:1
...and I want to follow His footsteps.

lender.name: Payam
lender.loan_because: I believe in connecting individuals to one another throughout the world. Only in this way will we achieve the ultimate goal of eradicating poverty from the earth.
lender.occupational_info: I will receive my Masters in Public Health this Spring, and begin my medical education at Case Western University in the fall.

lender.name: GERTRUDES
lender.loan_because: i want to sustain the credit needs of at least the 50 women-enterpreneurs of NORFIL/NWRMC for them to have continuous source of income and livelihood, thereby improve the quality of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Program Manager of a microfinance operation - the NORFIL Women Resource for Micro Credit in the Philippines.

lender.name: Sofia
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of individuals to make a difference in the world through small, well thought actions.
lender.occupational_info: I work in post production of television commercials.

lender.name: Garrett
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student and thus, studying is my work

lender.name: Alex Robertson
lender.loan_because: Nicholas Kristof can be very persuasive.
lender.occupational_info: I am in graduate school at MIT. I am studying computational biology.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I believe in a free market economy. I think that these types of loans are a good way to encourage individual responsibility and free(er) markets.

lender.name: Sharnell
lender.loan_because: Helping others to help themselves, their families, their friends, their communities and their local economy to break the cycle of poverty to improve lives and provide opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I help people clarify their life goals, and then guide and manipulate their finances to achieve those goals.

lender.name: Horace Mungin
lender.loan_because: There is such a great disparity between the well-to-do and the poor of this planet. This should not be - we travel through the universe together on the same ball we call earth.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer of stories that are about what I see - the good and the bad. I write what is in the hope that what should be, can be viewed and aspired.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: My family is here because someone's investment in their dreams. I feel that any investment in someone's dreams is a positive. We need to help each other as a society and make poverty a thing of the past.
lender.occupational_info: Im a humanitarian at heart and a filmmaker who enjoys bring smiles to people's faces.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: we're all neighbours

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I can. I had no idea there was the means to help individuals provide capital where it's needed so many places around the world. I've been the beneficiary of timely loans. My self respect remained intact and long after a gift would have been exhausted, the loan was still paying dividends.
lender.occupational_info: After a career in the theater and "alternative energy," I'm back on the farm helping to keep bees and raise sheep and timber. I'm a little creaky in the joints now, but I still love what I do.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: i have been fortunate, and wish to share my good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: i design bars and restaurants.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: We are all in this world together, and we must help each other, whenever and however possible.
lender.occupational_info: International political, business and development consulting, and business law.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I read Nicholas Kristof's column in The New York Times and I'm checking the Web site out. I can spare $25 bucks now and then.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a college student but also an aspiring journalist and world travler.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I am eager to engage, reach out to and learn from people with different life experiences from my own.
lender.occupational_info: I build instruments for rocket research in the upper earth atmosphere. We are curious about how the sun's energy filters down to us and about how the earth's atmospheric 'system' works.

lender.name: Guido
lender.loan_because:
For many years I have been involved with development work through international organizations. I travel to more than 25 countries in the world and have been in many of the poorest areas (including Bangladesh, the north east of Brazil, Bolivia, Haiti, Indonesia, Philippines...). Many loans and grants do not produce the "results on the ground" that they project; actually more often than not they don't!
More than ten years ago I started my own development work by sponsoring children in rural villages around the globe. Through Plan USA my wife and me now keep contact with more than a dozen kids which we adopted as "our foster kids".
Work on my own family history, especially in the last few years, brought back cherished memories about our family tradition of entrepreneurship. From grandfather's time in the early 1900s, to my dad's time in the second half of the 20th century, till now, my family has been strong promoters of entrepreneurship.
It is in that tradition that I started two years ago to lend to KIVA entrepreneurs. I like to help people who take initiative, who want to establish or grow a small business; I favor expanding trade and markets for products made by poor people.
Last but not least, I like to be "a banker", assemble a portfolio of loans that is well balanced, regionally as well as by sector, and test my skills in picking entrepreneurs that will make a profit, increase their income, and have no problems repaying their loan. I strongly belief that making loans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is one of the greatest contributions one can make.
lender.occupational_info: I follow daily the developments in financial markets and study the rapid growth and evolution of micro-finance and social enterprises; I am keenly interested in the developments in alternative medicine and health care. My interest in family history and in the use of DNA to enhance findings in genealogy i.e genetic genealogy, have led me to rediscover a valuable family tradition of entrepreneurship, taking risks, dreaming the impossible, and helping others to achieve their goals.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: help and hope are essential.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: it is an effective way to tangibly help someone get on her feet.
lender.occupational_info: I teach history to kids, aged 16-18, in a public high school.

lender.name: Gunilla
lender.loan_because: It makes sense.

lender.name: Jeffrey & Barbara
lender.loan_because: It's a little something we can do to add a bit of stability to this chaotic world.
lender.occupational_info: We sell antiques on eBay. Jeff used to be a computer programmer and Barb is an artist. For a time, both of us cooked together for a local school.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have enough money to loan others who are trying their hardest to build good lives for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired public librarian working in an Egyptology library in Luxor, Egypt, 6 months a year.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I recently moved back from Afghanistan where I had to opportunity to see the tremendously positive potential of microlending first hand. I first learned of Kiva in Kabul and am now totally addicted.
lender.occupational_info: I work on Sen. Barack Obama's presidential campaign.

lender.name: Carol
lender.occupational_info: I help people resolve disputes and conflict through conversation.

lender.name: Nazly
lender.loan_because: I believe that some of money I have earned actually belong to others.
lender.occupational_info: I am helping multi national companies restructure their investments.

lender.name: East Coast Artisans
lender.loan_because: As craftsmen/artists ourselves we know how much can be done with just a small amount of money. Once a person purchases basic equipment and supplies (often for much less than $1000), they are in business and can begin to make a profit.
lender.occupational_info: Lee Skalkos and Judy Standerford are both American craftsmen. Lee is a silversmith and Judy is a weaver. In 2006 they took on the job of publishing the East Coast Artisan, a trade magazine for working artists and craftsmen. We publish contact information about shows and events in the Northeast. We also include business tips, exhibitor submitted show reviews, profiles of artists, and other information of interest to craftsmen/artists.

lender.name: Stuart
lender.loan_because: We are quickly becoming a global community and we need to think of people-in-need in other countries as our neighbors. This opportunity gives hard-working people a chance to build a business in an honorable way.

lender.name: Kelley, Mike & Liam
lender.loan_because: We want to help.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: I have been helped by others in my life in the same way. I believe others will do well if they have an opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Professor and activist.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: This is an opportunity to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with political parties to compete in democracies around the world.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I like to see people helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help big companies use computers and technology to do their business better.

lender.name: Annette Laing
lender.loan_because: We all owe each other a helping hand. As a British immigrant to America, I wouldn't be where I am today without others' investment of time and money. I invest in Peru, primarily, as a big 'thank you' to Peruvians for a wonderful week I spent in Lima. :-)
lender.occupational_info: After many years as a university history professor, I am now the author of The Snipesville Chronicles, a MG/YA series of time-travel novels. I also create and perform non-boring history programs for kids in schools, libraries, and other venues. Check out my web site!

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that people with small amounts of capital can help people who need small amounts of capital.
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer and web site manager in a company that provides staffing and placement services to other businesses.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I tell my students to seize opportunities to make the world better, and so I must do the same
lender.occupational_info: I teach college students in the United States to be good citizens of their campus, community, country, and planet.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: What better way to spend a few dollars and help a small business establish itself and provide employment.
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Mark and Janet
lender.occupational_info: Mark is a doctor and Janet is the lead singer for a children's band.

lender.name: Carmen
lender.loan_because: I really like this program. I think a small contribution on my end means a lot to people who need it.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I can. It's a short life; one may as well be useful to others.
lender.occupational_info: We help people prepare for standardized tests like the SAT.

lender.name: D. Family
lender.loan_because: We want to make a meaningful impact on helping others help themselves.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: True and undefiled religion is meeting the widow and the orphan in their need.
lender.occupational_info: I am an author and a graduate-school professor. I write both non-fiction and fiction.

lender.name: Rich
lender.loan_because: I can help. Others have helped me in the past and now I can do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the U.S. Embassy in Cotonou, benin.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I am excited to see individuals taking charge and trying to grow a business through hard work and community involvement.
lender.occupational_info: I help business people and technical people involved in the insurance industry communicate and understand each other's needs.

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: Nicholas Kristof told me to.
lender.occupational_info: I study ocean science to understand how the Earth's climate works. By the way - that picture is me, in a kiva! Kivas are neat.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: Running your own business builds self-esteem and provides the opportunity to help other people become self-supporting.
lender.occupational_info: I teach yoga and also paint designs for greeting cards and gifts.

lender.name: Sridhar
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: I lend because I am skeptical of my own country's trickle-down theories of financing projects for ordinary people. Direct aid actually reaches the people who need it and will put it to use.
lender.occupational_info: I was professor of history at a state university, fortunate to have had important parts of my career abroad.

lender.name: Frank
lender.occupational_info: teacher/higher.education/montreal

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: He that hath pity upon the poor lendeth unto the LORD; and that which he hath given will he pay him again. Proverbs 19
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: it's a small, simple way to make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I write and edit articles for magazines and websites.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: women can save the planet

lender.name: Jann
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have more than enough to sustain my lifestyle. I believe that by helping others I make the world a better place for myself, my family & ultimately everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I travel extensively and enjoy learning about other people and their cultures. I document our trips in photographs and enjoy sharing them with friends and family as a way to include them in my experiences.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in life. I admire people who work to make their life better. I am happy that my meagre contributions can help a few of them.

lender.name: Lance
lender.loan_because: I feel it is important that the haves can enable the have-nots to also become haves.

lender.name: Veronique Bure
lender.loan_because: I beleive that with work, especially for for women, allows the whole family to access safety, better health and hopefully health care and education
lender.occupational_info: I work with babies, young children and their family to help them fight their handicap

lender.name: J & M
lender.loan_because: We want to help moms and children.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: It gives me the opportunity to directly impact the lives of others. Other people have helped me during my business life, so I know first hand what can be accomplished with a little "help from our friends".

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: I am able to and I have a strong belief in helping people to help themselves.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. The money that I have is more than I need to survive so if I can give what I have to someone who does not have enough then I can live knowing that I am contributing to the betterment of the world.

lender.name: Fred
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro-loans are a proven method of enabling individuals to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired navy medical department officer and also worked as a medical analyst.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I want to pass along the help I got when I needed it.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I think it's an efficient, worthwhile way to increase happiness on our planet. My two children are of Peruvian and Bolivian lineage.

lender.name: Carmen
lender.loan_because: I believe more good can be done with micro-loans than by charity giving.
lender.occupational_info: I have a micro farm (or large backyard) where I grow fruits, vegetables and flowers. Tengo una finquita muy chiquita donde cultivo frutas, vegetales y flores.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I want to "Pay it Forward". (when you have seen the movie, you know what I mean)
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office, where I have everything, but where I don't feel complete. I would love to work somewhere, where my help is more appreciated and where I could impact more.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I believe that microloans are an enpowering method of philanthropy and powerful force for credit outside the capital markets.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a reponsible international bank where philanthropy and volunteerism are an integral part of the culture.

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: it is a way to make a direct difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I program a website for a nonprofit in the health field.

lender.name: Bradley
lender.loan_because: It's so easy to make a difference with just a small amount of money.

lender.name: Siobhan
lender.loan_because: I loan because it’s an opportunity to directly impact people living in extreme poverty throughout the world. There is so much destruction in the world. Kiva gives lenders a chance to build up instead of tearing down. I like to think of the effect that one loan can have beyond the borrower, on the individual’s family and community. Over the time that I’ve been investing through Kiva, I have decided to loan only to women. That is not because there aren’t men in need of money and with great ideas for businesses, but because I want to empower women. And because I have an interest in arts and crafting, I look for entrepreneurs who are doing such things as weaving, painting and ceramics. These business owners may be keeping certain art forms alive; I want to support their efforts.

lender.name: The Hooper family
lender.loan_because: Every investor is essentially looking for an investment with a great return. There is no better return on an investment...giving opportunities, changing lives, helping others help themselves.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: What better investment is there than in ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be a teacher. I have worked various jobs in the architecture field but decided to try something new that might help more folks.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: everyone should have the opportunity to pursue their dream.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference to people like me - ordinary, hard-working, not rich. Thanks so much for putting this program together!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a high-end architect and I do working drawings for very expensive and beautiful homes using a computer.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful way to develop connections throughout the world and to foster self-sufficiency for many people.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to college students. I also teach creative writing, poetry and fiction to graduate level writers.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: Seems like a great way to assist those less fortunate. Thanks to Mr. Kristof for letting all NYT readers know about this!
lender.occupational_info: I am an attorney.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: joan
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to achieve their personal and professional goals. The idea that I could lend money to people who do not have access to US lending institutions seemed worthwhile & exciting.
lender.occupational_info: I was a teacher of children with moderate to severe disabilities for 23 years. I am now working on a PhD in early childhood special education at Vanderbilt University.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: the greatest gift I have ever received was the opportunity to achieve my potential in business.
lender.occupational_info: I started as a clerk. I worked very hard for several years. Then I took the risk of going out on my own as a trader.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: This is a small thing I can do that will make a real difference to some people who are trying hard to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I talk with people to try and help them find healthy ways to live their lives

lender.name: Vivian
lender.loan_because: I sincerely believe that the best (most effective and efficient) way to make a positive difference in this world is to inspire and help others to help themselves. Thanks to Kiva for giving us an avenue to do so.
lender.occupational_info: Touching people's lives by spreading positive energy to others in practical ways.

lender.name: marian
lender.loan_because: i admire these hard working people who just need a little help.
lender.occupational_info: we raise boer goats for market and for breeding stock on our 90 acre farm in the finger lakes region.

lender.name: Jerru
lender.loan_because: I am happy to demonstrate that citizens of the United States can get involved in the lives of the people of other countries, in ways that don't involve war or oil.
lender.occupational_info: I study the space environments of Earth and Saturn, using data from NASA spacecraft.

lender.name: Pamela & Roger
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it easy to do the right thing. What better way to lend a helping hand!

lender.name: Miriam
lender.occupational_info: I am an organic chemist working to make a molecule that fights cancer.

lender.name: Robin and Phil
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping others get their businesses started or grow their businesses so they can be self-sufficient in supporting themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Business consulting

lender.name: Daniel
lender.occupational_info: I use mathematics to understand how ecosystems function and what the consequences of human actions might be for those systems.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: Dude, I'm trying to make some cash here and the feds are all uptight about what they call "loansharking." Seriously, this is a good idea. Instead of making a one-time donation you can get a business going and help sustain economies - or something like that. Like teaching a man to fish instead of giving him a fish or loaning a woman money for a fish net, like I did.
lender.occupational_info: I live in America and basically I work to support my Starbuck's habit. I'm not really a caveman, that's just my silly American Joe sense of humor. Well, I'm kinda like a caveman in that I really need a haircut right now and I am fascinated by fire. Fire bad!

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: As a freelancer, and the daughter of immigrants I want to support people working to better themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I design logos, brochures and marketing material for companies

lender.name: SUDDHADEB
lender.loan_because: To start a company to providing software solution & development to various clients.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a programmer,which i want to quit and develop a multi-utility software with lots of features.In one word my software could be termed as task-effective and cost-effective.Due to which business sectors will be able to cut down their software implementation cost.And for this I need $2000 to start.

lender.name: Shirley & Jim
lender.loan_because: There is one world - Earth. There is one race - the human race.
lender.occupational_info: Shirley runs computer systems for schools. Jim is retired from the mobile telecom industry.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I enjoy assisting people in other countries who are trying to better their lives and help their families.
lender.occupational_info: Now mostly retired, I work part-time delivering cars for a car rental company and car dealerships in Michigan.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I was very poor as a child but am blessed with a "job" that I consider to be a fun adventure, lobstering out of Nantuclet.
lender.occupational_info: I now own a 36 foot lobsterboat and go on a "boatride" three or four days a week for four months to haul my lobster traps and make the money I need for the whole year. Couldn't be better for a wharf rat like me!

lender.name: Carol & Christine
lender.loan_because: empowering women entreprenuers changes society for the better!

lender.name: Maya
lender.loan_because: Because of the N. Krostof's article in the NYT on 3/27/07. I can't save the world, but Kiva allows me to make a small positive contribution to a few individual lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work with international students at Columbia University. More than half are from developing countries and come to NY to study economics.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: I have money now that I'm no longer in the Peace Corps!
lender.occupational_info: I help planes fly.

lender.name: Edward
lender.occupational_info: healthcare

lender.name: Lara Ewing
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference to the individuals and the communities receiving the loan. It allows people to be self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I help leaders in companies work together more effectively. This makes their companies prosper.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. Having traveled a lot in developing countries, I understand that a little can go a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I combine antique and contemporary textiles and other items such as old postcards to create decorative quilted items.

lender.name: Kjellrun
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I could say that it is the right thing to do, but I have always wanted to be an international banker like J. P. Morgan, and this is the closest that I am going to get! :-)
lender.occupational_info: I teach History at Shantou University.

lender.name: Betsy and family
lender.loan_because: my children need to understand that their most valuable possession is not money or an object; it is opportunity.

lender.name: JUDY&SIA
lender.loan_because: We give so that others may live their lives to the fullest.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Kerry & Jerry
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. If you've ever watched the movie "Pay It Forward," you understand.
lender.occupational_info: Jerry teaches underprivileged inner-city students, ages 11-14. Kerry markets Southern Comfort.

lender.name: Sigrid
lender.loan_because: I am a great believer in helping others to succeed. This is a wonderful program.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.occupational_info: I work for myself, too. I write and edit articles, mostly about medicine.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: it gives me joy to share

lender.name: Sukumar
lender.loan_because: I like helping the poor people especially the children in need.
lender.occupational_info: I'm committed to give excellent education, especially to the poor and orphans in South India.I may not shell out in millions but I can give my share to help someone in need.

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: I loan because I have been blessed, and I want to share.
lender.occupational_info: I am semi-retired. To me, that means that I am waiting, quietly, for my next challenge. I sold computer-related services in the corporate environment for 28 years.

lender.name: Lani
lender.loan_because: I hope it helps.
lender.occupational_info: I manage all of the functioning for our department - make sure classes happen, people get paid, students fulfill all the requirements for graduation, etc.

lender.name: Carolyn & Don
lender.loan_because: We have had such wonderful, enjoyable, fulfilling lives. We would like to share that with others.
lender.occupational_info: My husband works in a high school with children 16 through 18. I am a homemaker and a retired teacher of children 6 through 9. We have 7 grown children and 2 grandchildren.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.occupational_info: I study molecules and their reactions.

lender.name: Jantique
lender.loan_because: Hillel wrote, "If I am not for myself, who will be for me? If I am only for myself, what am I? And if not now, when?" Moses Maimonaides said that the highest form of charity is to Prevent Poverty.
lender.occupational_info: My passion is writing--and reading--fiction. Picture of Cassie Ranger.

lender.name: 2007 Pryor Legacy Class
lender.loan_because:
We are twenty-nine college students in the Pryor Leadership Program at William Jewell College. In 2007, we decided to help entrepreneurs around the world with microloans. Partnering with Kiva, we developed a semester-long fundraising and awareness campaign. The money raised has reached and will continue to reach entrepreneurs for years to come. Their success is the lasting legacy of our project.
A special thanks to everyone who supported the project. Without their help, we would not have reached our goals. This is as much their legacy as it is ours.
lender.occupational_info:
The Pryor Leadership Studies Program is internationally-recognized and one of the top leadership programs in the nation. The Pryor program is a 3-year program which complements any major and prepares students to be leaders in their workplace and community. The last stage in the Pryor program is a semester long Legacy Project that contributes to the local, regional, or international community.
William Jewell College is a campus of achievement that promises to offer students an outstanding liberal arts education with a focus on cultivating leadership, service and spiritual growth within a community inspired by rigorous intellectual challenges and Christian ideals.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: we're all connected and meant to share the good things God has brought our way.
lender.occupational_info: Advertising and marketing for a variety of clients. The name of our agency is tango, named after our dog that we found on the streets of Buenos Aires.

lender.name: Carol
lender.occupation: Facilitator of The Work of Byron Katie
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start a business with no support; I have done it a few times.
lender.occupational_info: Using a powerful self-inquiry process, I help people question the stressful beliefs that hold them back and cause suffering.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. My business has been down the last few years, but I will loan whenever and whatever I can.

lender.name: Lusi
lender.occupational_info: I help people make their businesses better

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: want people to have a chance at realizing their goal of establishing and running a successful business

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: We need to help each other. It's that simple.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I wish to benefit others.

lender.name: Matt & Sarah
lender.loan_because: To love our neighbor is to love God.

lender.name: Zac Cramer
lender.loan_because: My grandfather died and left me a lot of money, I decided to give a portion of it away. He started many small businesses throughout his life, so I know he would be thrilled to help other people with their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I run a Portland computer repair company, Happy Hamster Computer Repair.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I would like to assist in improving the economic condition of people in disadvantaged areas. I greatly admire Mother Teresa who helped the poorest of the poor. Although we can't walk in her footsteps, we want to help all we can.
lender.occupational_info: Karen is a State police officer who works special investigations.

lender.name: lawrence
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do i can i should i will
lender.occupational_info: i work in the operating room i save lives when they are hurt i should save lives before they are hurt

lender.name: Miranda
lender.loan_because: I want to support independent, female-owned businesses in the developing world.
lender.occupational_info: I am earning a graduate degree in creative writing at New York University. I also work parttime as a teacher and editor.

lender.name: leonard
lender.loan_because: it seems like a wonderful idea to give people a start in life
lender.occupational_info: i am retired

lender.name: Zyan & Zephaan mom
lender.loan_because: We are all together in the circle of life.
lender.occupational_info: I develop computer softwares for Energy and Healthcare industries.

lender.name: Pio & Cherry
lender.loan_because: it's a small way of helping empower others.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: it was better than my idea

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I work for the State of New Jersey regulating insurance companies.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I like the idea that I can make small loans that can be a part of a large difference.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I believe in the human spirit. I hope to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I have studied how money works at college. Accountants help business owners by giving them with information about how their business works. They take the information on sales and expenses and can tell business owners how they are doing and what can be done to make more money. Accountants also study some buiness law and contracts. I worked as a bookkeeper for small businesses during my college studies, so I am very good at knowing how to run small businesses. I can provide expert advice beyond simply loaning money, if such advice is asked for.

lender.name: Zachary
lender.loan_because: Microfinancing is an effective way to empower small business owners without simply handing them charity.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student interested in photography, political science and Africa. Hopefully I will find a way to combine them all.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: It is an excellent way to help people realize their dreams but still be responsible for their choices. Kiva provides opportunity which might not otherwise exist and I fully support the concept of self-actualization.
lender.occupational_info: Retired law enforcement.

lender.name: Kate & Owen
lender.loan_because: We want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I write educational books. My son is a high school student.

lender.name: C.Scott
lender.loan_because: Africa is the most amazing place. Its people are among the most hard working and helpful I have ever met. I am pleased to be assisting those who seek to help themselves and their community. Bahati Njema!
lender.occupational_info: I consult to government agencies and medium to small businesses in setting up their information systems.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: this makes so much sense.
lender.occupational_info: I create computer-based courses for businesses to use in training their employees.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: I loan because I have the opportunity to do so. The well being of people all over the world is important me. Where macro economics have failed I have faith that micro economics will succeed. I am using my documentary film THE HILLS OF CARACAS to raise funds for this cause.
lender.occupational_info: I fight wild land fires in the summer. When there are no fires in the winter I produce educational films.

lender.name: Bernice
lender.loan_because: I want people to have a chance to make a living and raise their children.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Red Cross blood donation center.

lender.name: basya
lender.loan_because: the world is made better one life, one day at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a clinic for people with developmental disabilities. I help link people to resources they are eligible for and can benefit from.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to need help.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a visual artist, working with collage and assemblage to create pieces of work that deal with subjects including the effects of war on humanity, the relationship of humans to nature, mythology, and anything else that comes into my head.

lender.name: Lorna
lender.loan_because: I know every dollar will get to a borrower who will use it far more productively than I ever could.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I would like to give people who are not forutnate enough to live in a country where there are as many opportunites as mine a chance to succeed and raise themselves out of poverty
lender.occupational_info: I work on economic and energy related consulting projects.
